hero.title: Proforma Financial Report
hero.description: Comprehensive proforma financial reporting to demonstrate your company's financial projections post-IPO, providing realistic insights to investors about future performance and financial impact.

objectives.title: Purpose of Proforma Financial Report
objectives.description: Our proforma financial report serves four critical objectives to support your IPO success and investor confidence.

items.title: Show Financial Projections
items.description: Demonstrate the company's financial projection conditions post-IPO to stakeholders and investors.

items.title: Provide Realistic Insights
items.description: Provide realistic insights to investors about future performance and growth potential.

items.title: Assess Financial Impact
items.description: Assess the financial impact of IPO including fresh funds and debt reduction implications.

items.title: Meet Disclosure Requirements
items.description: Fulfill information disclosure requirements from regulators (OJK and BEI) for IPO compliance.

components.title: Main Components of Proforma Financial Report
components.description: Our comprehensive proforma financial report includes three essential financial statements with detailed projections and assumptions.

items.title: Proforma Balance Sheet
items: Shows changes in capital structure, cash, assets, and liabilities after IPO proceeds
Example changes: increased cash, reduced short-term debt

items.title: Proforma Income Statement
items: Projects revenue, operational costs, and net profit in future periods
Assumes capacity increases or expansion funded by IPO proceeds

items.title: Proforma Cash Flow Statement
items: Shows cash flows from operations, investments, and financing post-IPO
Includes IPO fund utilization for CAPEX, debt repayment, or expansion

assumptions.title: Assumptions Used in Proforma Reports
assumptions.description: Proforma reports must include clear and detailed assumptions covering all critical financial aspects and strategic initiatives.

items.title: IPO Fund Amount
items.description: Total amount of funds to be raised from the IPO offering.

items.title: Use of Proceeds
items.description: Detailed allocation of IPO funds for business expansion, debt repayment, and working capital.

items.title: Revenue Growth Projections
items.description: Projected revenue growth rates and margin improvements over the forecast period.

items.title: Capital Structure Changes
items.description: Changes in debt-to-equity ratio and interest rate assumptions post-IPO.

items.title: IPO Costs & Tax Effects
items.description: Estimated IPO transaction costs and tax implications of the public offering.

process.title: Proforma Financial Report Development Process
process.description: Our systematic approach ensures accurate financial projections and comprehensive analysis for your IPO documentation.

steps.title: Collect Historical Data (3-5 Years)
steps.description: Gather and analyze 3-5 years of historical financial data to establish baseline performance trends.

steps.title: Determine Assumptions & Financial Scenarios
steps.description: Develop detailed assumptions for revenue growth, cost structure, and capital allocation scenarios.

steps.title: Prepare Proforma Balance Sheet, Income Statement & Cash Flow
steps.description: Create comprehensive proforma financial statements showing post-IPO financial position and performance.

steps.title: Internal & Consultant Validation
steps.description: Conduct thorough internal review and external consultant validation of assumptions and projections.

steps.title: Underwriter & Legal Auditor Review
steps.description: Submit for review and approval by underwriters and legal auditors to ensure compliance.

steps.title: Submission to Regulators & Investors
steps.description: Final submission to regulatory authorities and inclusion in investor presentation materials.

items.title: Proforma Financial Report Document
items.description: Complete audited proforma financial report ready for regulatory submission and investor presentations.

items.title: IPO Prospectus Disclosure
items.description: Detailed financial disclosures formatted for inclusion in the official IPO prospectus document.

items.title: Roadshow & Investor Presentation
items.description: Executive summary and key financial highlights prepared for roadshow and investor meetings.

items.title: Regulatory Filing Attachment
items.description: Properly formatted documents for submission to OJK/BEI as part of IPO registration requirements.

benefits.title: Benefits of Professional Proforma Financial Reporting
items: Attract investor confidence with realistic and transparent financial projections
Support management in developing post-IPO business plans and strategic initiatives
Enhance corporate accountability regarding IPO fund utilization and performance targets

cta.description: Get professional proforma financial reporting services to strengthen your IPO documentation and investor confidence. Our expert team will help you create comprehensive and compliant financial projections.
